text: "All or Nothing" is a 1999 song by Cher. It is the third single from her 22nd studio album Believe and went to the top 10 in Finland, Czech Republic, Scotland, Hungary, number 12 in the United Kingdom, number 14 in Denmark, number 62 in Australia, number 38 in the United States and number 28 in New Zealand. ==Track listings== ==="All or Nothing"=== UK CD1 # "All or Nothing" – 3:58 # "All or Nothing" (Almighty Definitive mix) – 8:32 # "All or Nothing" (K-Klass Klub mix) – 7:02 UK CD2 # "All or Nothing" – 3:58 # "All or Nothing" (Metro radio mix) – 3:59 # "All or Nothing" (Almighty radio edit) – 3:37 # "All or Nothing" (K-Klass radio mix) – 3:50 UK 12-inch single :A1. "All or Nothing" (Almighty Definitive mix) – 8:32 :B1. "All or Nothing" (K-Klass Klub mix) – 7:02 :B2.
